Sentencas: Degradation and poisoning of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks are continuously shortening the lifespan of SOFC systems.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Poisoning mechanisms, such as carbon deposition, form a coating layer, hence rapidly decreasing the efficiency of the fuel cells.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Gas composition of inlet gases is known to have great impact on the rate of coke formation.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Therefore, monitoring of these variables can be of great benefit for overall management of SOFCs.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Although measuring the gas composition of the gas stream is feasible, it is too costly for commercial applications.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: This paper proposes three distinct approaches for the design of gas composition estimators of an SOFC system in anode off-gas recycle configuration which are (i) accurate, and (ii)easy to implement on a programmable logic controller.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Firstly, a classical approach is briefly revisited and problems related to implementation complexity are discussed.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Secondly, the model is simplified and adapted for easy implementation.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Further, an alternative data-driven approach for gas composition estimation is developed.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Finally, a hybrid estimator employing experimental data and 1st principles is proposed.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Despite the structural simplicity of the estimators, the experimental validation shows a high precision for all of the approaches.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration

Sentencas: Experimental validation is performed on a 10 kW SOFC system.
Titulo: Online gas composition estimation in solid oxide fuel cell systems with anode off-gas recycle configuration
